@@ -10,9 +10,9 @@
     name: "Nguyen Van A",
     role: "CEO",
     img: MTP,
     bio: `Larry Truong – Money Coach & Managing Director | Money Coach & Giám Đốc Điều Hành
-Larry Truong is a seasoned professional in personal finance, with over 30 years of experience across both global and local markets—including two decades deeply engaged in Vietnam’s evolving financial services landscape. He leads MoneyWise Vietnam with a focus on delivering practical, high-impact personal finance solutions tailored to the needs of Vietnamese individuals and enterprises. The professional development programs he and his team have implemented have empowered over 50,000 financial advisors, sales managers, and 1,000 employees through transformative learning systems—setting new benchmarks for professionalism across the industry.
